channel.title: Help with server please!Tried tutorials and others, plz help
channel.description:
Hello, I can't get my server to work, I have searched around and corrected various things according to guides and tutorials here on the website, but I still can't get it to work. Please help. Below is a picture! I've tried many things, different compilers, etc.
Here is the code for my Current compiler:
[code]@echo off COLOR 07 title Tenacious Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
1st. I have no-ip running 2nd. I run the compiler.bat 3rd. I run runserver.bat 4th. I try to login on moparscape
I have already followed all the steps in the sticky guide. My router is linksys WRT54GS. I've already tried port forward.
Image below or at [url=http://i216.photobucket.com/albums/cc48/vthokie4me/help.jpg]http://i216.photobucket.com/albums/cc48/vthokie4me/help.jpg[/url] [img]http://i216.photobucket.com/albums/cc48/vthokie4me/help.jpg[/img]

anuslikker,

I log on to 0.0.0.0 and others logon to my one from No-IP but they can’t logon

item.title: Help with server please!Tried tutorials and others, plz help
item.dc:creator: @vthokie4me vthokie4me
item.description:
@vthokie4me wrote:

I did, my router, my moparscape and my internet properties. For my Internet properties this is what I have, maybe this is wrong:

Description of service:
taclan

Name or IP of the computer hosting your service:
192.168.128.1

External Port
5555

Internal Port
5555

item.title: Help with server please!Tried tutorials and others, plz help
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

make sure you change everthing you set at port 43594 to 5555 or it won’t work since your server is running on port 5555 and not 43594

Read full topic
